io.servicetalk.opentracing.http

Class TracingHttpRequesterFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.servicetalk.opentracing.http.TracingHttpRequesterFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpExecutionStrategyInfluencer, StreamingHttpClientFilterFactory, StreamingHttpConnectionFilterFactory

    public class TracingHttpRequesterFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements StreamingHttpClientFilterFactory, StreamingHttpConnectionFilterFactory, HttpExecutionStrategyInfluencer
    An HTTP filter that supports open tracing.

    Append this filter before others that are expected to to see Scope for this request/response. Filters appended after this filter that use operators with the after* prefix on response meta data or the response payload body (e.g. Publisher.afterFinally(Runnable)) will execute after this filter invokes Scope.close() and therefore will not see the Span for the current request/response.
